properties.areaDesc: Bellevue and Vicinity; Everett and Vicinity
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 13 at 1:30AM PST until January 13 at 8:00AM PST by NWS Seattle WA
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow showers will diminish over the morning hours.
Additional snow accumulation of 1 or 2 inches is possible.

* WHERE...Everett and vicinity, including Stanwood, Marysville,
and Mountlake Terrace and Bellevue and vicinity, including
Mill Creek, Kenmore, Kirkland, and Issaquah.

* WHEN...Until 8 AM PST this morning.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. In many areas heavy
snow fell overnight. There may be a few road closures.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

For the latest road conditions in Washington state, call 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM PST THIS MORNING... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IS CANCELLED
